participant_abstract.sent: It was a shame I had not had any time to prepare for the meeting at all, so as project manager I was as much in the dark about the project as anyone (this does not make for a good leader).
From following the power point slides we discovered that we were to design, manufacture and market a remote control unit.

participant_actions.sent: I am spending time filling out these questionaires instead of preparing for the next meeting, everyone is watching their computer screens awaiting instructions from Big Brother!

participant_decisions.sent: It was decided that we should consider a complex remote that controls more than one piece of equipment and that we should also consider a more simple remote that just controls one piece of equipment, for ease of time.

participant_problems.sent: Because no one (myself especially) new what we were really doing before the meeting and how the meeting should have ran, time was not spent correctly or very productivly.
